page.title: 03FINCHDEAN
page.content: { Finchdean}is the only village in this area. It has no shops but there are some small businesses. The{blacksmith}is veru busy. We saw lots of interesting things.One was the furnace. This is a fire and if you turn the handle it gets very hot. The blacksmith uses many different size nails but all are the same shape.He burns coke instead of coal as it is much cleaner. At one time 5 or 6 men worked there.All around the walls were many tools like tongs, iron rods and horse_shoes.The floor was covered with old shoes and boxes of nails and new shoes.By the furnace was a water trough for cooling the horse_shoes.
